ygData.subject: Guild Approved
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello All, Good news, our guild is approved. Soon, members of the Mystic Alliance will be wandering the world of Norrath. Unfortunately, it will take me awhile
ygData.messageBody:
Hello All,

Good news, our guild is approved. Soon, members of the Mystic Alliance will be wandering the world of Norrath. Unfortunately, it will take me awhile to get the
various chapters established on the servers that we need. I will be out of town Aug. 7 -14 (argh! a whole week without EQ) but on Sunday the 15th, I hope to get
the chapters set up.

I will be the guildmaster on Brell Serillis, but I will need others to do the same on the other servers. I know several of you have mentioned you'd be willing to
do it, so please tell me again if you want to do it, and let me know which server.

I will attempt to get as many set up on Sunday the 15th, as I can.

Thanks,
David

Dedric, lvl 9 gnome, Necro on Brell
Kerik, lvl 3 High Elf, Enchanter on Brell
